author: smorovic
body:
#### PR description:
Contains a few updates to EvF code base:
- fix for autmount discovery for the FRDStriped (Super-Fragment Builder) mode of DAQSource
- removal of PSets for transfer destination and stream type that were never provided from HLT menus not used by merging and transfer service in DAQ
- removing EvFOutputModule which has been superseeded by GlobalOutputModule in HLT

#### PR validation:
Tested in VM test cluster for EvF
title: [14_0_X][DAQ] DaqDirector fixes and cleanup, and removal of EvFOutputModule
